Hi there!

As part of my dissertation, I am investigating the impact of various management strategies on the biodiversity of grasslands.

The project is conducted within the research groups Forage Production and Grassland Systems and Agricultural Landscapes and Biodiversity at Agroscope and at the University of Zürich.
